snippet: The Lakers had N.B.A. title expectations in Coach Mike Brown’s second season after trading for center Dwight Howard and point guard Steve Nash.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers fire coach Mike Brown after 1-4 start to their season, leading to widespread speculation about potential return of Phil Jackson, who led the franchise to five championships before retiring in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The Lakers had N.B.A. title expectations in Coach Mike Brown’s second season after trading for center Dwight Howard and point guard Steve Nash.

headline.seo: Lakers Fire Coach Mike Brown After 1-4 Start
headline.main: Lakers Fire Their Coach, and Jackson Is on Radar
headline.print_headline: Lakers Fire Their Coach, And Jackson Is on Radar
